name: l3digitalnet-plugins
description: Curated collection of Claude Code plugins for enhanced development workflows

plugins.name: agent-orchestrator
plugins.description: General-purpose agent team orchestration with automatic context management, file isolation via git worktrees, and mechanical enforcement hooks

plugins.name: home-assistant-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive Home Assistant integration development toolkit with 27 skills, MCP server for live HA connection, automated validation, example integrations, and project templates

plugins.name: github-repo-manager
plugins.description: Conversational GitHub repository maintenance — health auditing, wiki sync, PR triage, issue triage, security posture, dependency auditing, and community file management via PAT

plugins.name: release-pipeline
plugins.description: Interactive release pipeline — context-aware menu for quick merge, full semver release, plugin release, status checks, dry runs, and changelog preview

plugins.name: linux-sysadmin-mcp
plugins.description: Comprehensive Linux system administration MCP server with ~100 tools across 15 modules — packages, services, users, firewall, networking, security, storage, containers, and more

plugins.name: design-assistant
plugins.description: Principled design document authoring and enforcement. /design-draft guides principles discovery and document generation. /design-review enforces principles across passes with auto-fix. Warm handoff transfers full context between commands.

plugins.name: plugin-test-harness
plugins.description: Iterative live testing framework for Claude Code plugins and MCP servers. Run a session branch, generate tests, record results, apply fixes, and iterate until convergence.
